issue.title: gcc "internal compiler error" in building arrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10912](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10912). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Building arrow with gcc failed with "internal compiler error". This looks like a compiler bug.
It happens on ubuntu18.04 with gcc7.5.0 and fedor31 with gcc 9.3.1, both x86_64 and arm64. Logs attached.

`git bisect` locates to this pr: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8472
